job_title: Research Scientist Intern - Computational Photography - PhD
title: Research Scientist Intern - Computational Photography - PhD
job_description: Meta Reality Labs Research is looking for upcoming scientists and researchers with great interest in designing, modeling, and prototyping advanced vision systems for real-time, low-power, always-on processing. The goal of this role is to optimize the full-stack vision system spanning from the image sensor, device processors, cloud computation, and corresponding algorithms. Ideal candidates will have a comprehensive understanding of computational imaging, distributed computation, computer vision, and machine learning algorithms, and sensor nanophotonics. Our internships are sixteen (16), to twenty-four (24) weeks long and we have various start dates throughout the year.
